text: WrestleMania 13 was a professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) event made by the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). It was held on March 23, 1997 at the Rosemont Horizon in Rosemont, Illinois. It was the thirteenth WrestleMania event held by the WWF. ==Matches== # Matches Stipulations Times Free for All Rockabilly defeated Flash Funk (with Tracy and Nadine) Singles match 7:05 1 The Headbangers (Mosh and Thrasher) defeated The New Blackjacks (Blackjack Windham and Blackjack Bradshaw), The Godwinns (Henry and Phineas) (with Hillbilly Jim), and Doug Furnas and Phil LaFon Four-way elimination match to find out the number one contenders for the WWF Tag Team Championship 10:39 2 Rocky Maivia (c) defeated The Sultan (with Bob Backlund and The Iron Sheik) Singles match for the WWF Intercontinental Championship 9:45 3 Hunter Hearst Helmsley (with Chyna) defeated Goldust (with Marlena) Singles match 14:28 4 Owen Hart and the British Bulldog (c) fought Mankind and Vader (with Paul Bearer) to a double countout Tag team match for the WWF Tag Team Championship 16:08 5 Bret Hart (c) defeated Steve Austin Submission match with Ken Shamrock as the special guest referee 22:05 6 The Legion of Doom (Hawk and Animal) and Ahmed Johnson defeated The Nation of Domination (Faarooq, Crush and Savio Vega) (with Wolfie D, J.C. Ice, D'Lo Brown, and Clarence Mason) Chicago Street Fight 10:45 7 The Undertaker defeated Sycho Sid (c) No Disqualification match for the WWF Championship 21:19 (c) â€“ refers to the champion(s) heading into the match == References == Category:1997 in professional wrestling Category:WrestleMania Category:1997 in the United States Category:1990s in Illinois
title: WrestleMania 13
